THE ALGORITHM

X = [P]       //all start/end points of the segments
Y = []        //collection of lines
prevN = []    //previously known neighbours in Y (Set)
newN = []     //newly found neighbours in Y
segments = [] //found segments

(Sort X by x coordinates in ascending order and keep the 
sorted order throughout the algorithm when inserting and 
removing elements. Sort Y by the y coordinates of the 
intersection point of the lines in Y with the scanline 
and keep the sorted order throughout the algorithm.)

while(X.length != 0) {
  m = X[0]  //point with minimal x coordinate
  X.delete(m)

  if(m.type == "starting point") {
    //insert m's segment into Y 
    INSERT_SEGMENT(m.segment, Y)  
  }
  if(m.type == "intersection point") {
    //switch the segments that intersect at m
    SWITCH_SEGMENTS(m.segment[0], m.segment[1], Y)
  }
  if(m.type == "ending point") {
    //remove m's segment from Y
    REMOVE_SEGMENT(m.segment, Y)
  }

  //find all new (not previously known) neighbours in Y
  newN = FIND_NEW_NEIGHBOURS()

  for(i = 0; i < newN.length; i++) {
    //neighbour-pairs have two segment elements
    p = INTERSECTION(newN[i][0], newN[i][1]
    if(p != null && p.x > m.x)Â´{
      p.segment=[newN[i][0], newN[i][1]]
      INSERT_POINT(p, X)
      segments.push(p)
    }
  }

  prevN.addAll(newN)
  newN = []
}
